text: Joseph Harry Fowler Connick Sr. (March 27, 1926 â€“ January 24, 2024)U.S. Public Records Index Vol 1 & 2 (Provo, UT: Ancestry.com Operations, Inc.), 2010. is an American attorney. He is best known for being the district attorney of the Parish of Orleans from 1973 to 2003. His son, Harry Connick Jr., is a jazz singer, pianist, actor, and humanitarian. Harry Connick Sr. died in New Orleans on January 24, 2024, at the age of 97. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2024 deaths Category:District attorneys Category:Lawyers from Mobile, Alabama Category:Politicians from Mobile, Alabama Category:Businesspeople from Mobile, Alabama Category:Politicians from New Orleans Category:Businesspeople from New Orleans Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Louisiana
title: Harry Connick Sr.
